BREAKING: Google Meet real-time translation is live.

You’ll never video call the same way:

☑ Toggle “Speech translation with Gemini” in Meet’s top-right panel.

☑ Talk normally. Gemini keeps your voice, swaps the language.

Today: English ↔ Spanish. 
Next up: German, Italian, Portuguese.

Google’s just killed 1,000+ SaaS in one-go.

☑ Robot-voice TTS overlays.
☑ Clunky third-party caption bots.
☑ Costly (actual) human interpreters.

In 24 hours, Google released…

☑ Ironwood TPU packs 42 exaflops per pod.
☑ Gemini 2.5 gets Deep Think, leaps benchmarks.
☑ AI Mode hits Search for every US user.
☑ Google Beam brings 3D calls to offices.
☑ Meet auto-translation keeps your own voice.
☑ Gemini Live camera share arrives on iOS.
☑ Agent Mode learns tasks, API this summer.
☑ Imagen 4 photoreal images, spells words.
☑ Veo 3 crafts HD video with native audio.
☑ Flow app turns prompts into cinematic clips.

Google just beat OpenAI at its own game.
